mapper.sql: id, menuName, pid, leaf, url, sort,deep,code,resource
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM `sys_user_role` ur INNER JOIN `sys_role` r ON r.`id` = ur.`roleId` INNER JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON rm.`roleId` = ur.`roleId` INNER JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menuId` AND ur.`userId` = #{uid} AND r.`roleState` = 1
